audioText: Sa volonté de réussir dans cette entreprise difficile impressionne tous ses collègues qui admirent sa détermination.
question: What impresses the colleagues?
options: His willingness to succeed in this difficult undertaking
His ability to work long hours every day
His knowledge of complex business strategies
explanation: The text states 'Sa volonté de réussir dans cette entreprise difficile impressionne tous ses collègues' - His willingness to succeed in this difficult undertaking impresses all his colleagues. 'Volonté' means willingness/will, 'réussir' means to succeed, and 'entreprise' here means undertaking.
